duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager in achieving retail store targets by driving sales.
Responsible for opening and closing the store in the absence of other management, ensuring safe and legal operations.
Deliver sales through friendly and efficient customer service to ensure a fun and enjoyable shopping experience for customers.
Demonstrate Claire's products and assist customers with product queries using product knowledge.
Assist with processing store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, and promotions.
Perform ear piercing after receiving full training.
Ensure the store looks presentable and inviting to customers.
